message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with wireless networks and channel state information, which are topics typically covered in the Information Theory (cs.IT), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), and Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories. The use of multiple transmitters and receivers also suggests the Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category. Finally, the proposed heuristic approach for solving the optimization problem may involve machine learning techniques, which are often covered in the Learning (cs.LG) sub-category.
